here.apikey: put here your API key, for more detail how you can get it see https://developer.here.com/documentation/identity-access-management/dev_guide/topics/plat-using-apikeys.html

api.openweathermap.appid: put here your openweathermap API key

api.yelp.Authorization: put here your API Key, for more detail how you can get it see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GFhGN36Wf7Q
